casebody.data:
Attorney Grievance Commission of Maryland, Petitioner
v.
Stephen John Saunders, Respondent Misc. Docket AG No. 31, Sept. Term, 2016 Court of Appeals of Maryland. Sept. 8, 2016

ORDER

Upon consideration of the Joint Petition for Disbarment by Consent filed herein pursuant to Maryland Rule 19-736, in which Respondent admits he committed professional misconduct in violation of Rules 1.5(c), 1.15(a) and (d), and 8.4(c) and (d) of the Maryland Lawyers' Rules of Professional Conduct, in effect at the time of the misconduct, it is this 8th day of September, 2016,

ORDERED, that Respondent, Stephen John Saunders, be and he is hereby disbarred from the practice of law in the State of Maryland; and it is further

ORDERED, that the Clerk of this Court shall remove the name of Stephen John Saunders from the register of attorneys in the Court and certify that fact to the Trustees of the Client Protection Fund of the Bar of Maryland and all Clerks of all judicial tribunals in this State in accordance with Maryland Rule 19-761.
